subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The 2004 Olympic hammer throw champion, Olga Kuzenkova of Russia, was barred two years for doping and is set to lose her 2005 world title.
snippet: The 2004 Olympic hammer throw champion, Olga Kuzenkova of Russia, was barred two years for doping and is set to lose her 2005 world title.
